name: occam-directed-graph
author: James Smith
description: A directed graph comprised of a directed acyclic graph and separate cycles.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar 'index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.watch-debug: npm run build-debug && chokidar 'index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug'
